data.text:
―Several days after Summer Training camp started. So far it was 
going well. You could almost say it was going TOO well.
data.processed:
<story>―Several days after Summer Training camp started. So far it was 
<story>going well. You could almost say it was going TOO well.

data.text:
What's wrong, Boss!? I can still keep goin'! 
How 'bout startin' the next part of the menu!?
data.name: Inari One
data.processed:
<story>What's wrong, Boss!? I can still keep goin'! 
<story>How 'bout startin' the next part of the menu!?

data.text:
What's wrong, Boss!? I can still keep goin'! 
How 'bout startin' the next part of the menu!?
data.name: Inari One
data.processed:
<story>What's wrong, Boss!? I can still keep goin'! 
<story>How 'bout startin' the next part of the menu!?

data.text:
I was amazed by Inari One's tenacity. But still, she was probably 
overworking herself. It was probably time to take a breather.
data.processed:
<story>I was amazed by Inari One's tenacity. But still, she was probably 
<story>overworking herself. It was probably time to take a breather.

data.text:
……Oh, I get it! There's a festival and fireworks startin' soon 
after all! Hehee, it really gets the Edo blood pumpin'!
data.name: Inari One
data.processed:
<story>……Oh, I get it! There's a festival and fireworks startin' soon 
<story>after all! Hehee, it really gets the Edo blood pumpin'!

data.text:
If she went with her friends, it would probably be a good change 
of pace. Inari One seemed convinced so I was a little relieved.
data.processed:
<story>If she went with her friends, it would probably be a good change 
<story>of pace. Inari One seemed convinced so I was a little relieved.

data.text:
Hm? Boss, ya still have more work to do? If my trainin's over, ya 
should have some free time too, right, Boss?
data.name: Inari One

choices.text: I still have a little more to do……
I still have a little more to do……

data.processed:
<story>Hm? Boss, ya still have more work to do? If my trainin's over, ya 
<story>should have some free time too, right, Boss?

data.text:
Hm? Boss, ya still have more work to do? If my trainin's over, ya 
should have some free time too, right, Boss?
data.name: Inari One

choices.text: I still have a little more to do……
I still have a little more to do……

data.processed:
<story>Hm? Boss, ya still have more work to do? If my trainin's over, ya 
<story>should have some free time too, right, Boss?

data.text:
Hmmmmm? ……that's a little troublin'. I was plannin' on goin' with 
ya Boss, so I turned down the others!
data.name: Inari One
data.processed:
<story>Hmmmmm? ……that's a little troublin'. I was plannin' on goin' with 
<story>ya Boss, so I turned down the others!

data.text:
Hmmmmm? ……that's a little troublin'. I was plannin' on goin' with 
ya Boss, so I turned down the others!
data.name: Inari One
data.processed:
<story>Hmmmmm? ……that's a little troublin'. I was plannin' on goin' with 
<story>ya Boss, so I turned down the others!

data.text:
Man, not havin' someone to go with, 
it's just a teeny bit lonely, huh……
data.name: Inari One
data.processed:
<story>Man, not havin' someone to go with, 
<story>it's just a teeny bit lonely, huh……

data.text:
Oh, ya will? Hehee, thanks! 
Alright, let's meet up again later tonight!
data.name: Inari One
data.processed:
<story>Oh, ya will? Hehee, thanks! 
<story>Alright, let's meet up again later tonight!

data.text: See ya!
data.name: Inari One
data.processed: <story>See ya!

data.text:
I'm sure she still had friends she could have invited……but I 
ended up promising Inari One, and headed back to our lodgings.
data.processed:
<story>I'm sure she still had friends she could have invited……but I 
<story>ended up promising Inari One, and headed back to our lodgings.

data.text:
(Boss, ya almost missed the chance to take a breather again. 
I just can't leave ya alone!)
data.name: Inari One
data.processed:
<story>(Boss, ya almost missed the chance to take a breather again. 
<story>I just can't leave ya alone!)

data.text:
(Boss, ya almost missed the chance to take a breather again. 
I just can't leave ya alone!)
data.name: Inari One
data.processed:
<story>(Boss, ya almost missed the chance to take a breather again. 
<story>I just can't leave ya alone!)

data.text: Hehee, gotta make sure they enjoy it to the fullest!
data.name: Inari One
data.processed: <story>Hehee, gotta make sure they enjoy it to the fullest!

data.text:
Oh, oh, aren't things startin' to get lively!? Kuuu～! This is it, 
this heated atmosphere! It gets the blood pumpin'!
data.name: Inari One

choices.text: At a festival, it's all about the stalls!
At a festival, it's all about the stalls!

data.processed:
<story>Oh, oh, aren't things startin' to get lively!? Kuuu～! This is it, 
<story>this heated atmosphere! It gets the blood pumpin'!

data.text:
Hahaa, alright! Guess we should hit 
up the stalls again! Let's go, Boss!
data.name: Inari One
data.processed:
<story>Hahaa, alright! Guess we should hit 
<story>up the stalls again! Let's go, Boss!

data.text:
Hahaa, alright! Guess we should hit 
up the stalls again! Let's go, Boss!
data.name: Inari One
data.processed:
<story>Hahaa, alright! Guess we should hit 
<story>up the stalls again! Let's go, Boss!

data.text:
With such a cheerful smile on her face, 
it was hard not to smile too.
data.processed:
<story>With such a cheerful smile on her face, 
<story>it was hard not to smile too.

data.text:
With her eyes sparkling, Inari One pulled my hand, and we hit 
each and every stall.
data.processed:
<story>With her eyes sparkling, Inari One pulled my hand, and we hit 
<story>each and every stall.

data.text:
Oooh～! The sound of fireworks echoes through my chest! 
Ta～maya～! Or somethin'! They're amazin'!
data.name: Inari One
data.processed:
<story>Oooh～! The sound of fireworks echoes through my chest! 
<story>Ta～maya～! Or somethin'! They're amazin'!

data.text: How is it, Boss?! Can ya hear me!?
data.name: Inari One
data.processed: <story>How is it, Boss?! Can ya hear me!?

data.text: How is it, Boss?! Can ya hear me!?
data.name: Inari One
data.processed: <story>How is it, Boss?! Can ya hear me!?

data.text:
Hahaa! Yellin' at the top of your lungs can feel pretty good, huh!? 
C'mon, together now! Ka～giya～!
data.name: Inari One
data.processed:
<story>Hahaa! Yellin' at the top of your lungs can feel pretty good, huh!? 
<story>C'mon, together now! Ka～giya～!

data.text: Hehee, just like that!
data.name: Inari One
data.processed: <story>Hehee, just like that!

data.text:
(……Huu, looks like I was gettin' a little excited too! 
But, if Boss was able to relax―)
data.name: Inari One

choices.text: Were you able to relax a bit?

data.processed:
<story>(……Huu, looks like I was gettin' a little excited too! 
<story>But, if Boss was able to relax―)

data.text:
(……Huu, looks like I was gettin' a little excited too! 
But, if Boss was able to relax―)
data.name: Inari One

choices.text: Were you able to relax a bit?

data.processed:
<story>(……Huu, looks like I was gettin' a little excited too! 
<story>But, if Boss was able to relax―)

data.text: Eh?
data.name: Inari One
data.processed: <story>Eh?

data.text:
I didn't think she was overworking herself. But, I let her know 
if she pushed too hard, it could happen.
data.processed:
<story>I didn't think she was overworking herself. But, I let her know 
<story>if she pushed too hard, it could happen.

data.text:
Considering Inari One's personality, she was probably shouldering 
many things. Even now, those things were probably what was 
pushing her forward―
data.processed:
<story>Considering Inari One's personality, she was probably shouldering 
<story>many things. Even now, those things were probably what was 
<story>pushing her forward―

data.text:
But it's not just pushing her forward, it could also be weighing 
her down. That's why I told her it was fine to relax a little.
data.processed:
<story>But it's not just pushing her forward, it could also be weighing 
<story>her down. That's why I told her it was fine to relax a little.

data.text:
W-what are ya sayin'!? Livin' up to others' expectations is what 
Inari-sama is all about! I've already prepared to carry at least―
data.name: Inari One
data.processed:
<story>W-what are ya sayin'!? Livin' up to others' expectations is what 
<story>Inari-sama is all about! I've already prepared to carry at least―

data.name: Inari One
data.processed: <story>――――

data.text: W-what's up with that…… like that, it sounds like……
data.name: Inari One
data.processed: <story>W-what's up with that…… like that, it sounds like……

data.text: (I was the one workin' too hard, doesn't it?)
data.name: Inari One
data.processed: <story>(I was the one workin' too hard, doesn't it?)

data.text:
……Well, that's a little surprisin'. 
You're a really unpredictable person.
data.name: Inari One
data.processed:
<story>……Well, that's a little surprisin'. 
<story>You're a really unpredictable person.

data.text:
(Sayin' it like that, guess I never thought 
about it. And on top of that―)
data.name: Inari One
data.processed:
<story>(Sayin' it like that, guess I never thought 
<story>about it. And on top of that―)

data.text:
(For some reason, it feels like somethin' has been lifted off my 
shoulders……like I just relaxed and got in to a hot bath)
data.name: Inari One
data.processed:
<story>(For some reason, it feels like somethin' has been lifted off my 
<story>shoulders……like I just relaxed and got in to a hot bath)

data.text:
What are ya sayin', ya moron!? ……Do ya think I haven't noticed? 
It's obvious ya had a change of heart.
data.name: Chief
data.processed:
<story>What are ya sayin', ya moron!? ……Do ya think I haven't noticed? 
<story>It's obvious ya had a change of heart.

data.text:
If you're an Edo kid from the rough side of town! Go to the big 
stage of the Twinkle Series, stir it up, and make some big waves!!
data.name: Chief
data.processed:
<story>If you're an Edo kid from the rough side of town! Go to the big 
<story>stage of the Twinkle Series, stir it up, and make some big waves!!

data.text:
(It's true, I was carryin' a lot. The Chief's expectations, and 
not wantin' to disappoint him)
data.name: Inari One
data.processed:
<story>(It's true, I was carryin' a lot. The Chief's expectations, and 
<story>not wantin' to disappoint him)

data.text:
That's right! If it's for Inari-chan, 
I'll go wherever to cheer her on!!
data.name: Soba-stand Old Lady
data.processed:
<story>That's right! If it's for Inari-chan, 
<story>I'll go wherever to cheer her on!!

data.text:
The Edo Kid, Inari has arrived! 
On that big stage, go knock their socks off!!
data.name: Shopkeeper Old Man
data.processed:
<story>The Edo Kid, Inari has arrived! 
<story>On that big stage, go knock their socks off!!

data.text:
(With those people that say they'll go anywhere to cheer me on, 
I need to hold my chest out and run, don't I?)
data.name: Inari One
data.processed:
<story>(With those people that say they'll go anywhere to cheer me on, 
<story>I need to hold my chest out and run, don't I?)

data.text: (――That's why)
data.name: Inari One
data.processed: <story>(――That's why)

data.text:
WaaAAAAAAA!! 
Inari! Inari! Inari! Inari!
data.name: Townsfolk
data.processed:
<story>WaaAAAAAAA!! 
<story>Inari! Inari! Inari! Inari!

data.text:
(……maybe it's because I thought it was 
natural to shoulder this 『Alone』)
data.name: Inari One
data.processed:
<story>(……maybe it's because I thought it was 
<story>natural to shoulder this 『Alone』)

data.text:
……Hee, guess I can't call myself Inari-sama 
if I'm doin' somethin' so boorish.
data.name: Inari One
data.processed:
<story>……Hee, guess I can't call myself Inari-sama 
<story>if I'm doin' somethin' so boorish.

data.text:
Guess I must've been gettin' too in to it. 
Since Boss had to tell me 『Don't shoulder it alone』.
data.name: Inari One
data.processed:
<story>Guess I must've been gettin' too in to it. 
<story>Since Boss had to tell me 『Don't shoulder it alone』.

data.text:
Guess I must've been gettin' too in to it. 
Since Boss had to tell me 『Don't shoulder it alone』.
data.name: Inari One
data.processed:
<story>Guess I must've been gettin' too in to it. 
<story>Since Boss had to tell me 『Don't shoulder it alone』.

data.text: I've got you with me, after all.
data.name: Inari One
data.processed: <story>I've got you with me, after all.

data.text:
Hehee, good job, Boss! 
Things could have taken a turn for the worse, huh?
data.name: Inari One
data.processed:
<story>Hehee, good job, Boss! 
<story>Things could have taken a turn for the worse, huh?

data.text:
Hehee, good job, Boss! 
Things could have taken a turn for the worse, huh?
data.name: Inari One
data.processed:
<story>Hehee, good job, Boss! 
<story>Things could have taken a turn for the worse, huh?

data.text: Oh! Take a look! They're sendin' up a big one!!
data.name: Inari One
data.processed: <story>Oh! Take a look! They're sendin' up a big one!!

data.text:
(If we're shoulderin' this together then, we'll be able to make 
even bigger waves than if I was on my own!)
data.name: Inari One
data.processed:
<story>(If we're shoulderin' this together then, we'll be able to make 
<story>even bigger waves than if I was on my own!)

data.text: (In that case, rather than Tamaya or Kagiya, it should be―)
data.name: Inari One
data.processed: <story>(In that case, rather than Tamaya or Kagiya, it should be―)

data.text: 『Waashoi!』, right?!!!!!!
data.name: Inari One
data.processed: <story>『Waashoi!』, right?!!!!!!
